```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
penguins <- read_csv(here("data/penguins_lter.csv")) # read in data

penguins <- penguins %>% # clean up the names
  clean_names()

```

